ygData.subject: Re: Help for the "Tome of Magi"...*Spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Eye of Zoom is conjuration? I tought it was divination... I m not aware of any conjuration spell for Wizards. -- Vincent ARCHER  -=-=-  Herve Schauer
ygData.messageBody:
According to mstokes:
> Evocation = Any Shocks, Bolts, Rains, and other damage causing spells
> Abjuration = Shields, skins, and O'Kiels Radiation
> Alteration = Root, Gates, Bind, Portals, Evacuations, levitation, and
> Teleports
> Divination = Senses, Identify, sights, and Lights
> Conjuration = Eye of Zomm

Eye of Zoom is conjuration? I tought it was divination... I'm not
aware of any conjuration spell for Wizards.

--
